ComicInfo.Summary: First Drafts: A super-agent breaks into a high-security area ruled by Cardinal Lazarus, so he sicks his demonic minions after her. Exciting! Elsewhere, a cabal of monks call forth the Ministers of Mercy. Wow! Meanwhile, Max Faraday's sister wakes him up for school. Um...okay.
ComicInfo.Title: First Drafts
